meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one sixteenth of a pound.
meanings.sent1: An amu is a small unit of weight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use the amu to measure the mass of atoms.
meanings.sent3: I bought a bag of apples that weighed exactly one amu.
meanings.sent4: The amu of knowledge in his brain was immeasurable.
meanings.sent5: The amu of sugar in the recipe made the cake taste sweet.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the names of certain chemical compounds.
meanings.sent1: The chemist added the amu to the end of the compound's name.
meanings.sent2: Students learn about chemical nomenclature and the use of amu.
meanings.sent3: The potion was labeled with the mysterious amu suffix.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the amu of magic, casting a spell on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The amu at the end of the word changed its entire meaning.
